Class HTMLEntities

extends Object
    HTML entities

      • BASIC_ESCAPE

        public static final Map<String,String> BASIC_ESCAPE
        Mapping to escape the basic XML and HTML character entities. Namely: " & < >

      • BASIC_UNESCAPE

        public static final Map<String,String> BASIC_UNESCAPE
        Reverse of BASIC_ESCAPE for unescaping purposes.

      • APOS_ESCAPE

        public static final Map<String,String> APOS_ESCAPE
        Mapping to escape the apostrophe character to its XML character entity.

      • APOS_UNESCAPE

        public static final Map<String,String> APOS_UNESCAPE
        Reverse of APOS_ESCAPE for unescaping purposes.

      • XML_ESCAPE

        public static final Map<String,String> XML_ESCAPE
        XML escape map

      • XML_UNESCAPE

        public static final Map<String,String> XML_UNESCAPE
        Reverse of XML_ESCAPE for unescaping purposes.

      • ISO8859_1_ESCAPE

        public static final Map<String,String> ISO8859_1_ESCAPE
        Mapping to escape ISO-8859-1 characters to their named HTML 3.x equivalents.

      • ISO8859_1_UNESCAPE

        public static final Map<String,String> ISO8859_1_UNESCAPE
        Reverse of ISO8859_1_ESCAPE for unescaping purposes.

      • HTML3_ESCAPE

        public static final Map<String,String> HTML3_ESCAPE
        Mapping to escape ISO-8859-1 characters to their named HTML 3.x equivalents.

      • HTML3_UNESCAPE

        public static final Map<String,String> HTML3_UNESCAPE
        Reverse of HTML3_ESCAPE for unescaping purposes.

      • HTML40_EXTENDED_ESCAPE

        public static final Map<String,String> HTML40_EXTENDED_ESCAPE
        Mapping to escape additional character entity references. Note that this must be used with ISO8859_1_ESCAPE to get the full list of HTML 4.0 character entities.

      • HTML40_EXTENDED_UNESCAPE

        public static final Map<String,String> HTML40_EXTENDED_UNESCAPE
        Reverse of HTML40_EXTENDED_ESCAPE for unescaping purposes.

      • HTML4_ESCAPE

        public static final Map<String,String> HTML4_ESCAPE
        HTML4 escape map

      • HTML4_UNESCAPE

        public static final Map<String,String> HTML4_UNESCAPE
        Reverse of HTML4_ESCAPE for unescaping purposes.
